redirects here portrayal in Marvel Cinematic Universe see Bruce Banner Marvel Cinematic Universe Superhero appearing in Marvel Comics publications related media Hulk Promotional image Hulk from TV series Avengers Assemble Art by Brandon Peterson Publication information Publisher Marvel Comics First appearance Incredible Hulk May Created by Stan Lee Jack Kirby In story information Alter ego Robert Bruce Banner Species Human mutate Place origin Dayton Ohio Team affiliations Avengers Defenders Horsemen Apocalypse Fantastic Four Pantheon Warbound Notable aliases Joe Fixit War World Breaker Doc Green Devil Hulk Abilities As Bruce Banner Genius level intellect As Hulk Invulnerability Superhuman strength stamina durability Anger empowerment Regenerative healing factor Hulk fictional superhero appearing in publications by American publisher Marvel Comics Created by writer Stan Lee artist Jack Kirby character first appeared in debut issue Incredible Hulk May In his comic book appearances character both Hulk green skinned hulking muscular humanoid possessing vast degree physical strength his alter ego Dr Robert Bruce Banner physically weak socially withdrawn emotionally reserved physicist two existing as independent personalities resenting other Following his accidental exposure gamma rays during detonation an experimental bomb Banner physically transformed into Hulk subjected emotional stress at against his will often leading destructive rampages conflicts that complicate Banner s civilian life Hulk s level strength normally conveyed as proportionate his level anger Commonly portrayed as raging savage Hulk has been represented with other personalities based on Banner s fractured psyche from mindless destructive force brilliant warrior genius scientist in his own right Despite both Hulk Banner s desire solitude character has large supporting cast including Banner s lover Betty Ross his best friend Rick Jones his cousin She Hulk therapist ally Doc Samson his co founders superhero team Avengers etc However his uncontrollable power has brought him into conflict with his fellow heroes others Despite this he tries his best do s right while battling villains such as Leader Abomination Absorbing Man more Lee stated that Hulk s creation was inspired by combination Frankenstein Dr Jekyll Mr Hyde Although Hulk s coloration has varied throughout character s publication history most usual color green He has two main catchphrases Hulk strongest one better known Hulk smash which has founded basis numerous pop culture memes citation needed One most iconic characters in popular culture character has appeared on variety merchandise such as clothing collectable items inspired real world structures such as theme park attractions been referenced in number media Banner Hulk have been adapted in live action animated video game incarnations character was first played in live action feature film by Eric Bana In Marvel Cinematic Universe not verified in body character was portrayed by Edward Norton in film Incredible Hulk by Mark Ruffalo in films Avengers Iron Man in cameo Avengers Age Ultron Thor Ragnarok Avengers Infinity War Captain Marvel in cameo Avengers Endgame Contents Publication history Concept creation Series history Fictional character biography Alternative versions Hulk Characterization Personality Powers abilities Supporting characters Cultural impact Analysis Other Marvel characters by same name Other versions Reception See also References External links Publication history Further information List Hulk titles Concept creation Hulk first appeared in Incredible Hulk cover dated May written by writer editor Stan Lee penciled co plotted by Jack Kirby inked by Paul Reinman Lee cites influence from Frankenstein Dr Jekyll Mr Hyde in Hulk s creation It was patently apparent that monstrous character Thing was most popular character in Marvel s recently created superhero team Fantastic Four long time d been aware fact that people were more likely favor someone was less than perfect It s safe bet that remember Quasimodo but easily can name any heroic handsomer more glamorous characters in Hunchback Notre Dame then s Frankenstein ve always had soft spot in my heart Frankenstein monster No one could ever convince me that he was bad guy He never wanted hurt anyone he merely groped his torturous way through second life trying defend himself trying come terms with those sought destroy him decided might as well borrow from Dr Jekyll Mr Hyde as well our protagonist would constantly change from his normal identity his superhuman alter ego back again Kirby commenting upon his influences in drawing character recalled as inspiration tale mother rescues her child trapped beneath car Lee has also compared Hulk Golem Jewish mythology In Science Superheroes Gresh Weinberg see Hulk as reaction Cold War threat nuclear attack an interpretation shared by Weinstein in Up Up Oy Vey This interpretation corresponds with other popularized fictional media created during this time period which took advantage prevailing sense among Americans that nuclear power could produce monsters mutants In debut Lee chose grey Hulk he wanted color that did not suggest any particular ethnic group Colorist Stan Goldberg however had problems with grey coloring resulting in different shades grey even green in issue After seeing first published issue Lee chose change skin color green Green was used in retellings origin with even reprints original story being recolored next two decades until Incredible Hulk vol December reintroduced grey Hulk in flashbacks set close origin story An exception early trade paperback Origins Marvel Comics from which explains difficulties in keeping grey color consistent in Stan Lee written prologue reprints origin story keeping grey coloration Since December reprints first issue have displayed original grey coloring with fictional canon specifying that Hulk s skin had initially been grey Lee gave Hulk s alter ego alliterative name Bruce Banner he found he had less difficulty remembering alliterative names Despite this in later stories he misremembered character s name referred him as Bob Banner an error which readers quickly picked up on discrepancy was resolved by giving character official full name Robert Bruce Banner Series history Hulk s original series was canceled with issue March Lee had written each story with Kirby penciling first five issues Steve Ditko penciling inking sixth character immediately guest starred in Fantastic Four March months later became founding member superhero team Avengers appearing in first two issues team s eponymous series Sept Nov returning as an antagonist in issue as an ally in Jan May He then guest starred in Fantastic Four April May which revealed Banner s full name as Robert Bruce Banner Amazing Spider Man July Incredible Hulk May Cover art by Jack Kirby Paul Reinman Around this time co creator Kirby received letter from college dormitory stating Hulk had been chosen as its official mascot Kirby Lee realized character had found an audience in college age readers year half after Incredible Hulk was canceled Hulk became one two features in Tales Astonish beginning in issue Oct This new Hulk feature was initially scripted by Lee with pencils by Steve Ditko inks by George Roussos Other artists later in this run included Jack Kirby June Oct Gil Kane credited as Scott Edwards Feb Bill Everett April Oct John Buscema Marie Severin Tales Astonish run introduced super villains Leader would become Hulk s nemesis Abomination another gamma irradiated being Marie Severin finished out Hulk s run in Tales Astonish Beginning with issue April book was retitled Incredible Hulk vol ran until Marvel canceled series launched Hulk Marvel filed trademark Incredible Hulk in United States Patent Trademark Office issued registration in Len Wein wrote series from through working first with Herb Trimpe then as issue December with Sal Buscema was regular artist ten years Issues Oct Nov introduced Wolverine as an antagonist would go on become one Marvel Comics most popular characters In Marvel launched second title Rampaging Hulk black white comics magazine This was originally conceived as flashback series set between end his original short lived solo title beginning his feature in Tales Astonish After nine issues magazine was retitled Hulk printed in color In two Hulk television films were aired strong ratings leading an Incredible Hulk TV series which aired from huge ratings success series introduced popular Hulk catchphrase Don t make me angry wouldn t like me m angry broadened character s popularity from niche comic book readership into mainstream consciousness Bill Mantlo became series writer five years beginning with issue March Mantlo s Crossroads Eternity stories Oct Nov explored idea that Banner had suffered child abuse Later Hulk writers Peter David Greg Pak have called these stories an influence on approaches character Mantlo left series Alpha Flight that series writer John Byrne took over Incredible Hulk final issue Byrne s six issue run featured wedding Bruce Banner Betty Ross Writer Peter David began twelve year run with issue May He returned Roger Stern Mantlo abuse storylines expanding damage caused depicting Banner as suffering dissociative identity disorder DID In David killed off Banner s long time love Betty Ross Marvel executives used Ross death as an opportunity pursue return Savage Hulk David disagreed leading his parting ways with Marvel Also in Marvel relaunched Rampaging Hulk as standard comic book rather than as comics magazine Incredible Hulk was again cancelled with issue its second volume in March was replaced with new series Hulk following month with returning writer Byrne art by Ron Garney New series writer Paul Jenkins developed Hulk s multiple personalities his run was followed by Bruce Jones with his run featuring Banner being pursued by secret conspiracy aided by mysterious Mr Blue Jones appended his issue Incredible Hulk run with limited series Hulk Thing Hard Knocks Nov Feb which Marvel published after putting ongoing series on hiatus Peter David had initially signed contract six issue Tempest Fugit limited series returned as writer it was decided make that story first five parts revived volume three After four part tie in House M storyline one issue epilogue David left series once more citing need do non Hulk work sake his career Writer Greg Pak took over series in leading Hulk through several crossover storylines including Planet Hulk World War Hulk which left Hulk temporarily incapacitated replaced as series title character by demigod Hercules in retitled Incredible Hercules Feb Hulk returned periodically in Hulk which then starred new Red Hulk In September Incredible Hulk was relaunched as Incredible Hulk vol series was retitled Incredible Hulks with issue Nov encompass Hulk s expanded family ran until issue Oct it was replaced with Incredible Hulk vol issues Dec Dec written by Jason Aaron with art by Marc Silvestri As part Marvel s Marvel NOW relaunch series called Indestructible Hulk Nov debuted under creative team Mark Waid Leinil Yu This series was replaced in with Hulk by Waid artist Mark Bagley Fictional character biography During experimental detonation gamma bomb scientist Robert Bruce Banner saves teenager Rick Jones has driven onto testing field Banner pushes Jones into trench save him but hit with blast absorbing massive amounts gamma radiation He awakens later seemingly unscathed but that night transforms into lumbering grey form pursuing soldier dubs creature hulk Originally it was believed that Banner s transformations into Hulk were caused by sunset undone at sunrise but later after Rick witnessed Banner turn into Hulk at daytime following failed attempt by Ross men shoot Hulk into space it was discovered be caused by anger Banner was cured in Incredible Hulk but chose restore Hulk s powers with Banner s intelligence gamma ray machine needed affect transformation induced side effects that made Banner temporarily sick weak returned his normal state In Avengers September Hulk became founding member title s eponymous superhero team By Avengers overuse gamma ray machine rendered Hulk as an uncontrollable rampaging monster subject spontaneous changing In Tales Astonish September Hulk appeared as an antagonist Giant Man series established stress as trigger Banner turning into Hulk vice versa It was during this time that Hulk developed more savage childlike personality shifting away from his original portrayal as brutish but not entirely unintelligent figure Also his memory both long term short term would now become markedly impaired in his Hulk state Tales Astonish February was last Hulk story feature him speaking in complete sentences In Tales Astonish March Banner s Hulk s dual identity became publicly known Rick Jones mistakenly convinced that Banner was dead he actually had been catapulted into future told Major Glenn Talbot rival Banner affections Betsy Ross truth Consequently Glenn informed his superiors that turned Banner into wanted fugitive upon returning present s saw Banner Betty nearly marry in Incredible Hulk February Betty ultimately married Talbot in issue Dec Hulk also traveled other dimensions one which had him meet empress Jarella used magic bring Banner s intelligence Hulk came love him Hulk helped form Defenders In s Banner once again gained control over Hulk gained amnesty his past rampages however due manipulations supernatural character Nightmare Banner eventually lost control over Hulk It was also established that Banner had serious mental problems even before he became Hulk having suffered childhood traumas that engendered Bruce s repressed rage Banner comes terms with his issues time Hulk Banner were physically separated by Doc Samson Banner recruited by U S government create Hulkbusters government team dedicated catching Hulk Banner finally married Betty in Incredible Hulk May following Talbot s death in Banner Hulk were reunited in Incredible Hulk Sep with issue returned Hulk his grey coloration with his transformations once again occurring at night regardless Banner s emotional state In issue grey Hulk persona Joe Fixit was introduced morally ambiguous Las Vegas enforcer tough guy Banner remained repressed in Hulk s mind months but slowly began reappear s saw Green Hulk return In issue Jan Hulk was revamped in storyline that saw personalities Banner Grey Hulk Savage Hulk confront Banner s past abuse at hands his father Brian new Guilt Hulk persona Overcoming trauma intelligent Banner cunning Grey Hulk powerful Savage Hulk personalities merge into new single entity possessing traits all three Hulk also joined Pantheon secretive organization superpowered individuals His tenure with organization brought Hulk into conflict with tyrannical alternate future version himself called Maestro in Future Imperfect miniseries rules over world many heroes are dead In Banner three Hulks Savage Hulk Grey Hulk Merged Hulk now considered separate personality referred as Professor become able mentally interact with one another each personality taking over shared body as Banner began weaken due his suffering from Lou Gehrig s disease During this four personalities including Banner confronted yet another submerged personality sadistic Devil intent on attacking world attempting break out Banner s fracturing psyche but Devil was eventually locked away again Leader was able devise cure disease using genes taken from corpse Brian Banner In it revealed that Nightmare has manipulated Hulk years it implied that some all Hulk s adventures written by Bruce Jones may have been just an illusion In Illuminati decide Hulk dangerous remain on Earth send him away by rocket ship which crashes on Planet Sakaar ushering in Planet Hulk storyline that saw Hulk find allies in Warbound marry alien queen Caiera relationship that was later revealed have born him two sons Skaar Hiro Kala After Illuminati s ship explodes kills Caiera Hulk returns Earth with his superhero group Warbound declares war on planet in World War Hulk However after learning that Miek one Warbound had actually been responsible destruction Hulk allows himself be defeated with Banner subsequently redeeming himself as hero as he works with against new Red Hulk defeat new supervillain team Intelligencia In s Hiro Kala traveled Earth destroy OldStrong Power wielded by Skaar forcing Skaar Hulk defeat imprison him within his home planet During Fear Itself storyline Hulk finds one Serpent s magical hammers associated with Worthy becomes Nul Breaker Worlds As he starts transform Hulk tells Red She Hulk run far away from him Rampaging through South Central America Nul was eventually transported New York City he began battling Thor with aid Thing was transformed into Angrir Breaker Souls After defeating Thing Thor stated that he never could beat Hulk instead removed him from battle by launching him into Earth orbit after which Thor collapsed from exhaustion Landing in Romania Nul immediately began heading base vampire king Dracula Opposed by Dracula s forces including legion monsters Nul was seemingly unstoppable Only after intervention Raizo Kodo s Forgiven was Nul briefly slowed Ultimately Nul makes his way Dracula s castle timely arrival Kodo Forgiven member Inka disguised as Betty Ross able throw off effects Nul possession Throwing aside hammer Hulk regains control promptly leaves upon realizing Betty s true nature With crisis concluded Hulk contacted Doctor Doom help separating him Banner good in return an unspecified favour Doom proceeded perform brain surgery on Hulk extracting uniquely Banner elements from Hulk s brain cloning new body Banner Doctor Doom demands keep Banner his own purposes Hulk reneges on deal flees with Banner s body leaving his alter ego in desert he was created ensure that Doctor Doom cannot use Banner s intellect Banner goes insane due his separation from Hulk irradiating an entire tropical island trying recreate his transformation something he cannot do as cloned body lacks genetic elements Banner that allowed him process gamma radiation Hulk forced destroy his other side by letting him be disintegrated by gamma bomb prompting Hulk accuse Doom tampering with Banner s mind only Doom observe that was witnessed was simply Banner without Hulk use as scapegoat his problems Initially assuming that Banner dead Hulk soon realizes that Banner was somehow re combined with him gamma bomb disintegrated Banner s body resulting in Hulk finding himself waking up in various strange locations including helping Punisher confront drug cartel run by mutated dog hunting sasquatches with Kraven Hunter being forced face Wolverine Thing in an old SHIELD base Banner eventually leaves video message Hulk in which he apologizes his actions while they were separate having come recognize that he better person with Hulk than without two joining forces thwart Doombots attempt use animals on Banner s irradiated island as basis new gamma army using one kind gamma cure Banner had created turn all animals back normal Following this Bruce willingly joined spy organization S H E L D allowing them use Hulk as weapon in exchange providing him with means funding create lasting legacy himself After Hulk had suffered brain damage upon being shot in head by Order Shield assassin having been carefully trained target Bruce at just right part brain incapacitate him without triggering transformation Iron Man used Extremis cure Hulk This procedure also increased Banner s mental capacity which gave him intelligence tweak Extremis virus within him unleash new persona Hulk super intelligent Doc Green During Original Sin storyline Bruce Banner confronted by eye murdered Uatu Watcher Bruce temporarily experienced some Tony Stark s memories first meeting before either them became Hulk Iron Man During this vision Bruce witnessed Tony modifying gamma bomb be more effective prompting Bruce realize that Tony was essentially responsible him becoming Hulk in first place Subsequent research reveals that Tony s tampering had actually refined bomb s explosive potential so that it would not disintegrate everyone within blast radius with result that Tony s actions had actually saved Bruce s life In AXIS storyline mistake made by Scarlet Witch causes various heroes villains experience moral inversion Bruce Banner attended meeting between Nick Fury Jr Maria Hill S H E L D Avengers refused turn over Red Skull Later he sided with Edwin Jarvis tried prevent his teammates from executing Red Skull Hulk was thrown aside by Luke Cage Hulk s sorrow at his friends betrayal awakened new persona known as bloodthirsty Kluh described as Hulk s Hulk being ruthless part himself that even Hulk repressed with this new version easily defeating Avengers sneering that Hulk they knew was nothing more than sad piece Doc Green s ID Kluh then leaves wreak havoc with Nova attempting stop him after witnessing his rampage with remaining good heroes As with other inverted Avengers X Men Kluh was restored Hulk Brother Voodoo was summoned back life by Doctor Doom so that Daniel Drumm s ghost can possess Scarlet Witch undo inversion With his newfound intellect Doc Green came conclusion that world was in danger by Gamma Mutates thus needed be depowered He developed serum made from Adamantium nanobites that absorbed gamma energy He used these depower Red Leader Red She Hulk Red Hulk Skaar Gamma Corps Bomb but decided spare She Hulk as he concluded that she was one gamma mutation whose life had been legitimately improved by her mutation At close storyline Doc Green discovered that he was beginning disappear as result Extremis serum wearing off He ultimately allowed himself fade away returning his normal Hulk form as he feared that remaining at his current intellectual level would lead him becoming Maestro During Secret Wars storyline Hulk took part in incursion between Earth Earth Hulk used Fastball Special with Colossus destroy Triskelion As part All New All Different Marvel branding Amadeus Cho becomes new Hulk Flashbacks reveal that Hulk had absorbed dangerous new type radiation while helping Iron Man Black Panther deal with massive accident on Kiber Island Fearing Hulk s meltdown would kill countless innocents Cho was able use special nanites absorb Hulk from Banner take it into himself become his own version Hulk leaving Banner normal free from Hulk He then rescued from bar fight by Amadeus tells him that he cured Having confirmed that he can no longer transform sense Hulk Bruce spends some time travelling across America taking various risks such as driving at high speeds running away from bear gambling in Las Vegas until he confronted by Tony Stark out concern that Bruce has death wish Bruce instead acknowledges that he still harbors guilt rage over so many Hulk s rampages were provoked by various agencies refusing leave him alone During Civil War II storyline vision Inhuman Ulysses shows rampaging Hulk standing over corpses superheroes Meanwhile Bruce Banner shown have set up laboratory in Alpine Utah he approached by Captain Marvel followed by Tony Stark rest Avengers X Men Inhumans confrontation leads Beast hacking into Banner s work servers revelation that he had been injecting himself with dead gamma irradiated cells S H E L D Director Maria Hill places him under arrest Banner gets infuriated at all these events suddenly Hawkeye shoots Banner with an arrow head then heart killing him much dismay horror superheroes especially Tony Stark At an Avengers presided tribunal Hawkeye states that Bruce Banner had approached him ordered him kill him if he ever showed signs turning into Hulk again At funeral Korg Warbound stated Hulk wanted be left alone his allies that he made along way have become his family In his video will Bruce leaves various items other heroes his allies including leaving Doctor Strange his notes on Hulk s ability perceive ghosts an egg timer various former current other Hulks based on one Bruce s more successful attempts control himself as he would sit down three minutes doing nothing before making particularly big decision then decide if he still wanted do it Following funeral Bruce Banner Hand in allegiance with Daniel Drumm s ghost steal Bruce Banner s body in order use dead bolster ranks reassembled Uncanny Avengers went Japan attempted enlist Elektra help in stopping Hand ritual that Hand performed has been completed as Uncanny Avengers are attacked by revived Hulk wearing samurai armor Uncanny Avengers were able contain Hulk s rampage sever his mystical link Beast Hand Afterwards Hulk regressed back Bruce Banner returned dead During Secret Empire storyline Arnim Zola used an unknown method temporary revive Bruce Banner Hydra Supreme version Captain America persuades his Hulk side attack Underground s hideout called Vault He fought Thing Giant Man s Vengers until temporary revival that Arnim Zola did Bruce Banner started wear off cause Hulk die again During No Surrender arc exiled Elder Universe named Challenger revives Hulk be his ace in hole during contest between his Black Order Grandmaster s Lethal Legion Hulk participated since he knew that Earth will be destroyed either way while his Bruce Banner suspects that Hulk s revivals were manifestation Hulk s immortality While defeating Cannonball Living Lightning breaking Vision draining gamma energy out Robert Maverick s Hulk Plug In Wonder Man successfully reasoned with him as Hulk destroyed Pyarmoid in Voyager s possession After feeling remorse happened Bruce Banner became Hulk faced off against Challenger After Challenger sent Hulk into Earth s orbit Hulk was pleased that he managed hurt Challenger While maintaining low profile Bruce Banner was shot by Tommy Hill Dogs Hell biker gang during robbery that also claimed lives Sandy Brockhurst Josh Alfaro He came back life turned into Hulk he badly beat up Tommy Hill witnesses in Dogs Hell told Detective Gloria Mayes attacker as she reporter Jackie McGee have suspicion that it was Hulk even though Banner believed be dead Alternative versions Hulk Main article Alternative versions Hulk number alternate universes alternate timelines in Marvel Comics publications allow writers introduce variations on Hulk in which character s origins behavior morality differ from mainstream setting citation needed In some stories someone other than Bruce Banner Hulk In some versions Hulk succumbs darker side his nature in Future Imperfect December future version Hulk has become Maestro tyrannical ruthless ruler nuclear war irradiated Earth in Old Man Logan an insane Hulk rules over post apocalyptic California leads gang his inbred Hulk children created with his first cousin She Hulk Characterization Statue Hulk Like other long lived characters Hulk s character cultural interpretations have changed with time adding modifying character traits Hulk typically seen as hulking man with green skin wearing only pair torn purple pants that survive his physical transformation As character progressed As Bruce Banner character approximately ft in m tall weighs lb kg but transformed into Hulk character can stand between feet m tall weigh up lb kg Following his debut Banner s transformations were triggered at nightfall turning him into grey skinned Hulk In Incredible Hulk Hulk started appear with green skin in Avengers Banner realized that his transformations were now triggered by surges adrenaline in response feelings fear pain anger Incredible Hulk established that Hulk s separate personality was not due mutation affecting his brain but Banner was suffering from multiple personality disorder with savage Green Hulk representing Banner s repressed childhood rage aggression Grey Hulk representing Banner s repressed selfish desires urges Personality Bruce Banner During his decades publication Banner has been portrayed differently but common themes persist Banner physicist sarcastic seemingly very self assured he first appears in Incredible Hulk but also emotionally withdrawn in most fashions Banner designed gamma bomb which caused his affliction ironic twist his self inflicted fate has been one most persistent common themes Arie Kaplan describes character thus Robert Bruce Banner lives in constant state panic always wary that monster inside him will erupt therefore he can t form meaningful bonds with anyone As child Banner s father Brian often got mad physically abused both Banner his mother creating psychological complex fear anger fear anger destruction it can cause that underlies character Banner has been shown be emotionally repressed but capable deep love Betty Ross solving problems posed him Under writing Paul Jenkins Banner was shown be capable fugitive applying deductive reasoning observation figure out events transpiring around him On occasions that Banner has controlled Hulk s body he has applied principles physics problems challenges used deductive reasoning It was shown after his ability turn into Hulk was taken away by Red Hulk that Banner has been extremely versatile as well as cunning dealing with many situations that followed he was briefly separated from Hulk by Doom Banner became criminally insane driven by his desire regain power Hulk but once two recombined he came accept that he was better person with Hulk provide something him focus on controlling rather than allowing his intellect run without restraint against world Hulk original Grey Hulk was shown as average in intelligence roamed aimlessly became annoyed at puny humans took him dangerous monster Shortly after becoming Hulk his transformation continued turning him green coinciding with him beginning display primitive speech by Incredible Hulk radiation treatments gave Banner s mind complete control Hulk s body While Banner relished his indestructibility power he was quick anger more aggressive in his Hulk form while he became known as hero alongside Avengers his increasing paranoia caused him leave group believing he would never be trusted Originally Hulk was shown as simple minded quick anger Hulk generally divorces his identity from Banner s decrying Banner as puny Banner From his earliest stories Hulk has been concerned with finding sanctuary quiet often shown reacting emotionally situations quickly Grest Weinberg call Hulk dark primordial side Banner s psyche Even in earliest appearances Hulk spoke in third person Hulk retains modest intelligence thinking talking in full sentences Lee even gives Hulk expository dialogue in issue six allowing readers learn just capabilities Hulk has Hulk says But these muscles ain t just show All gotta do spring up just keep goin In s Hulk was shown as more prone anger rage less talkative Writers played with nature his transformations briefly giving Banner control over change ability maintain control his Hulk form Artistically conceptually character has become progressively more muscular powerful in years since his debut Originally Stan Lee wanted Hulk be grey but due ink problems Hulk s color was changed green This was later changed in story indicate that Grey Hulk Savage Hulk are separate personalities entities fighting control in Bruce s subconscious Grey Hulk incarnation can do more unscrupulous things that Robert Bruce Banner could not bring himself do with many sources comparing Grey Hulk moody teenager that Banner never allowed himself be While Grey Hulk still had madder he gets stronger he gets part that similar Savage Hulk it on much slower rate It said by Leader that Grey Hulk stronger on nights New Moon weaker on nights Full Moon Originally night Bruce Banner becomes Grey Hulk changes back by dawn In later comics willpower stress would have Robert Bruce Banner turn into Grey Hulk During one storyline he was placed under spell prevent him turning back into Bruce Banner publicly presumed dead he was teleported away from gamma bomb explosion that destroyed an entire town Grey Hulk adopted specific name as Joe Fixit security guard Las Vegas casino owner with Grey Hulk often being referred as Joe after these events volume issue needed Gravage Hulk result Robert Bruce Banner using Gamma Projector on himself which merged his Savage Hulk Grey Hulk personas This form possesses raw power Savage Hulk cunning intellect Grey Hulk While he doesn t draw on anger empower him Gravage Hulk persona draws on dimensional nexus energies increase his level Dark Hulk persona result Hulk being possessed by Shanzar This form has black skin viciously strong Convinced that unaided Banner Green Hulk Grey Hulk identities would eventually destroy each other Doc Samson uses hypnosis merge three create new single identity combining Banner s intelligence with Grey Hulk s Banner s attitudes Green Hulk s body This new Merged Hulk Professor Hulk considered himself cured began new life but merger was not perfect Hulk sometimes still considered Banner separate person overcome with rage Merged Hulk would transform back into Banner s human body while still thinking himself Hulk Merged Hulk largest three primary Hulk incarnations has higher base line While in calm emotional state Merged Hulk stronger than Savage Hulk he calm Unlike Savage Hulk Grey Hulk Robert Bruce Banner subconsciously installed type safeguard within this incarnation safeguard that Merged Hulk gets angry he regresses back Robert Bruce Banner with mind Savage Hulk Green Scar persona unleashed on Sakaar considered an enraged version Gravage Hulk In addition he an expert in armed combat like use swords shields Green Scar also capable leader an expert strategist Kluh described as Hulk s Hulk This form has black skin red lines mohawk Kluh had incredible power he bested inverted Avengers knocked around Nova has normal intellect Doc Green variation Merged Hulk persona that result Extremis fixing Hulk s brain This persona powerful enough destroy Tony Stark s mansion with one thunderclap Immortal Hulk result Bruce Banner Hulk having been through different deaths rebirths This incarnation articulate smart cunning does merciless attacks on those do harm Unlike other Hulk incarnations Immortal Hulk content with waiting inside Bruce If Bruce injured by sunset Immortal Hulk will emerge with his transformation being limited night time Powers abilities Banner considered one greatest scientific minds on Earth possessing mind so brilliant it cannot be measured on any known intelligence test Norman Osborn estimates that he fourth most intelligent person on Earth Banner holds expertise in biology chemistry engineering medicine physiology nuclear physics Using this knowledge he creates advanced technology dubbed Bannertech which on par with technological development from Tony Stark Doctor Doom Some these technologies include force field that can protect him from attacks Hulk level entities teleporter Hulk possesses potential seemingly limitless physical strength which influenced by his emotional state particularly his anger This has been reflected in repeated comment madder Hulk gets stronger Hulk gets cosmically powerful entity known as Beyonder once analyzed Hulk s physiology claimed that Hulk s potential strength had no finite element inside Hulk s strength has been depicted as sometimes limited by Banner s subconscious influence Jean Grey psionically shut Banner off Hulk became strong enough overpower destroy physical form villain Onslaught Writer Greg Pak described Worldbreaker Hulk shown during World War Hulk as having level physical power Hulk was stronger than any mortal most immortals ever walked Earth depicted character as powerful enough completely destroy entire planets His strength allows him leap into lower Earth orbit across continents he has displayed superhuman speed Exposure radiation has also been shown make Hulk stronger His durability regeneration endurance also increase in proportion his temper Hulk resistant injury damage though degree which varies between interpretations but he has withstood equivalent solar temperatures nuclear explosions planet shattering impacts Despite his remarkable resiliency continuous barrages high caliber gunfire can hinder his movement some degree while he can be temporarily subdued by intense attacks with chemical weapons such as anesthetic gases although any interruption such dosages will allow him quickly recover He has been shown have both regenerative adaptive healing abilities including growing tissues allow him breathe underwater surviving unprotected in space extended periods injured healing from most wounds within seconds including on one occasion complete destruction most his body mass His future self Maestro was even eventually able recover from being blown powder As an effect he has an extremely prolonged lifespan He also possesses less commonly described powers including abilities allowing him home in his place origin in New Mexico resist psychic control unwilling transformation grow stronger from radiation dark magic punch his way between separate temporal spatial dimensions see interact with astral forms Some these abilities were in later years explained as being related his ability home in on New Mexico bomb site was due his latent ability sense astral forms spirits since bomb site was also place Maestro s skeleton was Maestro s spirit was calling out him in order absorb his radiation In first Hulk comic series massive doses gamma rays would cause Hulk transform back Banner although this ability was written out character by s citation needed Supporting characters Main article List Hulk supporting characters Over long publication history Hulk s adventures many recurring characters have featured prominently including his best friend sidekick Rick Jones love interest wife Betty Ross her father often adversarial General Thunderbolt Ross Both Banner Hulk have families created in respective personas Banner son Brian an abusive father killed Banner s mother while she tried protect her son from his father s delusional attacks cousin Jennifer Walters She Hulk serves as his frequent ally Banner had stillborn child with Betty while Hulk has two sons with his deceased second wife Caiera Oldstrong Skaar Hiro Kala his DNA was used create daughter named Lyra with Thundra warrior woman Fantastic Four March featured Hulk s first battle with Thing Although many early Hulk stories involve Ross trying capture destroy Hulk main villain often radiation based character like Gargoyle Leader along with other foes such as Toad Men Asian warlord General Fang Ross daughter Betty loves Banner criticizes her father pursuing Hulk General Ross right hand man Major Glenn Talbot also loves Betty torn between pursuing Hulk trying gain Betty s love more honorably Rick Jones serves as Hulk s friend sidekick in these early tales Hulk s archenemies are Abomination Leader Abomination more monstrous wreaks havoc fun pleasure Leader super genius has tried plan after plan take over world Cultural impact See also Hulk in other media Hulk character concepts behind it have been raised level iconic status by many within outside comic book industry In Official U S PlayStation Magazine claimed character had stood test time as genuine icon American pop culture In Hulk was listed as th greatest comic book character by Wizard magazine Empire magazine named him as th greatest comic book character fifth greatest Marvel character In Hulk placed No on IGN s list Top Comic Book Heroes fourth on list Top Avengers in Analysis Hulk often viewed as reaction war As well as being reaction Cold War character has been cipher frustrations Vietnam War raised Ang Lee said that Iraq War influenced his direction In Michael Nyman edited edition Guardian Stefanie Diekmann explored Marvel Comics reaction September attacks Diekmann discussed Hulk s appearance in tribute comic Heroes claiming that his greater prominence alongside Captain America aided in stressing connection between anger justified violence without having depict anything more than well known well respected protagonist In Marvel Five Fabulous Decades World s Greatest Comics Les Daniels addresses Hulk as an embodiment cultural fears radiation nuclear science He quotes Jack Kirby thus As long as we re experimenting with radioactivity s no telling may happen much our advancements in science may cost us Daniels continues Hulk became Marvel s most disturbing embodiment perils inherent in atomic age In Comic Book Nation Bradford Wright alludes Hulk s counterculture status referring Esquire magazine poll amongst college students which revealed that student radicals ranked Spider Man Hulk alongside likes Bob Dylan Che Guevara as favorite revolutionary icons Wright goes on cite examples his anti authority symbol status Two these are Ballad Hulk by Jerry Jeff Walker Rolling Stone cover September full color Herb Trimpe piece commissioned magazine Hulk has been caricatured in such animated television series as Simpsons Robot Chicken Family Guy such comedy TV series as Young Ones character also used as cultural reference point someone displaying anger agitation example in Daily Mirror review an EastEnders episode character described as going into Incredible Hulk mode smashing up his flat In September British Prime Minister Boris Johnson likened himself Hulk in an interview with Mail On Sunday as political pressure built on him request an extension date UK s withdrawal from European Union Hulk especially his alter ego Bruce Banner also common reference in rap music term was represented as an analogue marijuana in Dr Dre s while more conventional references are made in Ludacris Jermaine Dupri s popular single Welcome Atlanta Ang Lee directed Hulk film saw discussion character s appeal Asian Americans Taiwanese born Ang Lee commented on subcurrent repression that underscored character Hulk that mirrored his own experience Growing up my artistic leanings were always repressed was always pressure do something useful like being doctor Jeff Yang writing San Francisco Chronicle extended this self identification Asian American culture arguing that passive aggressive streak runs deep among Asian Americans especially those have entered creative careers often against parents wishes have been explorations about real world possibility Hulk s gamma radiation based origin In Science Superheroes Lois Grest Robert Weinberg examined Hulk s powers explaining scientific flaws in them Most notably they point out that level gamma radiation Banner exposed at initial blast would induce radiation sickness kill him if not create significant cancer risks Banner hard radiation strips cells ability function They go on offer up an alternate origin in which Hulk might be created by biological experimentation with adrenal glands GFP Charles Q Choi from LiveScience com further explains that unlike Hulk gamma rays are not green existing as they do beyond visible spectrum gamma rays have no color at all that we can describe He also explains that gamma rays are so powerful most powerful form electromagnetic radiation times more powerful than visible light that they can even convert energy into matter possible explanation increased mass that Bruce Banner takes on during transformations Just as Incredible Hulk strongest one as he says himself so are gamma ray bursts most powerful explosions known Other Marvel characters by same name Prior debut Hulk in May Marvel had earlier monster characters that used name Hulk but had no direct relation Debuting in Strange Tales June was huge robot built by Albert Poole called Hulk which was actually armor that Poole would wear In modern day reprints character s name was changed Grutan First appearing in Journey Into Mystery Nov was Xemnu Living Hulk huge furry alien monster Coincidentally character s debut story was also illustrated by Jack Kirby character reappeared in issue March Since then character has been mainstay in Marvel Universe was renamed Xemnu Titan huge orange slimy monster was featured in movie called Hulk in Tales Astonish July In modern day reprints character s name was changed Glop Other versions Main article Alternative versions Hulk Reception Hulk was ranked on listing Marvel Comics monster characters in See also List Marvel Comics superhero debuts Hulk in other media United States portal Comics portal Speculative fiction portal References b Cronin Brian November Comic Book Urban Legends Revealed Comic Book Resources Archived from original on April Stan Lee began referring more than couple months Incredible Hulk s alter ego as Bob Banner rather than Bruce Banner that he was originally named Responding criticism goof Stan Lee in issue Fantastic Four laid out he was going handle situation s only one thing do we re not going take cowardly way out From now on his name Robert Bruce Banner so we can t go wrong no matter WHAT we call him Simonson Walt w Adams Arthur p Thibert Art i Big Trouble on Little
